statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM Inventory WHERE item_price > 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_price FROM Inventory WHERE item_price < 30 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Inventory WHERE item_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Inventory WHERE item_price > 100 ORDER BY item_id ASC
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM Inventory WHERE item_price < 50 AND item_description LIKE '%high-quality%'
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM Inventory WHERE item_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY item_price ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, item_id FROM inventory WHERE item_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT world_name, studio_name FROM game_world WHERE studio_name = 'Nintendo';
SELECT world_id, world_name, studio_name FROM game_world ORDER BY world_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN game_world ON inventory.item_id = game_world.world_id WHERE inventory.quantity >= 10 AND game_world.studio_name = 'Example Studio';
SELECT item_name, quantity, studio_name FROM inventory JOIN game_world ON inventory.item_id = game_world.world_id WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name AS name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT world_name, COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM game_world GROUP BY world_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY total_items DESC, world_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_studios;
SELECT studio_name, studio_id FROM game_studios;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE studio_id = 1;
SELECT world_description, world_name FROM game_worlds;
SELECT * FROM game_studios;
SELECT studio_name, studio_id FROM game_studios ORDER BY studio_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_quantity > 10;
SELECT studio_name, SUM(item_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM game_studios JOIN game_inventory ON game_studios.studio_id = game_inventory.studio_id GROUP BY studio_name;
SELECT item_name, world_name FROM game_inventory JOIN game_worlds ON game_inventory.item_id = game_worlds.world_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level >= 50;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_description FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, price ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players ORDER BY player_level DESC
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon' OR item_type = 'Armor' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, coins FROM Players WHERE level > 5 ORDER BY coins DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM Players p JOIN PlayerInventory pi ON p.player_id = pi.player_id;
SELECT quest_id, quest_title, quest_reward FROM Quests WHERE quest_reward > 100 ORDER BY quest_reward DESC, quest_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT player_name, coins FROM Players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM Items WHERE item_category = 'Armor';
SELECT player_name, email, coins FROM Players WHERE coins > 100 ORDER BY coins DESC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM Players JOIN PlayerInventory ON Players.player_id = PlayerInventory.player_id WHERE Players.level >= 5 AND PlayerInventory.quantity > 0 ORDER BY player_name, quantity DESC;
